item.title: Viant Technology - Full Stack Intern
item.description: Responsibilities/Accomplishments As a Full Stack Intern in the Platform team I - Developed a video-to-audio conversion microservice to enhance ad campaign performance using creatives in not only video but also audio ad placements, achieving an estimated `15%` lift in revenue. Used `AWS Lambda`, `MediaConvert`, `SNS`, and `DynamoDB`. Teamed up with another intern to automate the process of adding new third-party user segments using `Angular`, `Golang`, `AWS APIGateway`, and `S3`, saving `8+` engineer hours per use.
